titleInfo.title: M.S. Temple in Washington, D.C. to O.P. Temple

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

subject.topic: confinement; health; Indian claim; Indians; kidneys; pamphlet; sickness; torpidity of the liver; water.
Choctaw; Pension Office; Secretary of the Interior; Treasury Department.

mods.note: Pamphlet on Choctaw account forwarded (not found among papers); exchanged pension office job with Treasury Department Clerk; fears his confinement may injure his health.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
